evidence.claim: uMed uses AWS services for cloud infrastructure including Lambda and S3.
uMed confirms adherence to HIPAA regulations on their security page.
Integration with EHR systems is supported through FHIR and HL7 standards.
X12 transaction sets are utilized for billing and claim processing.
The company employs a RESTful API for all integrations with third-party services.

icp.icp_reason: uMed leverages X12 standards for EHR integration, indicating they fit the ICP profile.
